v.v: Save me, God, by your name,
For strangers have risen up against me,
He will repay my enemies with evil;
I will sacrifice to you with a freewill offering;
For he has rescued me from every trouble;

v: and judge me in your might.
give ear to the words of my mouth.
and pitiless men have sought after my life;
they have not set God before them.
the Lord is the one who upholds me.
I will give thanks to your name, Yahweh, for it is good.
my eye has looked in triumph on my enemies.
